reviewText: if you want to learn more steps and routines, this dvd is it. it is challenging and fun to learn. sometimes a little difficult, but if you go over it you'll learn.
Thank goodness there is some instruction on what to do with arms. I am an adult beginner and always lose my way in class when it comes to arms.
very informative and easy to follow.  makes it appears effortless to perform.  I am more comfortable using my arms and the transition to another move is easier.
